Sam-0.npc: Did you hear that Maurice used to be in love with Bertha? Apparently she rejected him because he was 40 years older than her. It’s a shame they didn’t marry, together they would have been the richest couple in the country!

Sam-1.npc: The debt collectors will surely be paying a visit soon. I’ve been bleeding money for months at the blackjack table.

Sam-2.npc: I heard a rumor that Charles has been left off of Bertha’s will. Maybe he is as lazy as Avni says.

Sam-3.npc: Damn it! Not again. Why do I always lose?;I have the worst luck.;It’s so unfair! Everyone gets a good hand but me.;One of these days I’ll win big, and then I’ll quit gambling for good.
